A

apiCall(String, List<NameValuePair>, RdioApiCallback) - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Call an Rdio web service API method, using the credentials of the current user.

C

canUserPlayFullStreams() - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Can the user play full streams? Only valid after onRdioReady() is called on the listener or isReady() returns true
cleanup() - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Unhooks listeners and releases any resources.
com.rdio.android.api - package com.rdio.android.api
 

G

getPlayerForTrack(String, String, boolean) - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Constructs a MediaPlayer for the given track key.
getSubscriptionState() - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Returns the subscription state for the user signed in to the Rdio application.

I

isReady() - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Is the Rdio API ready for playback and has it established the user subscription state?

L

LIBRARY_VERSION - Static variable in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Version for this library, incremented whenever significant changes are made.

O

onApiFailure(String, Exception) - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioApiCallback
Called if the API call fails (results in an HTTP error code != 200)
onApiSuccess(JSONObject) - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioApiCallback
Called if the API call succeeds.
onRdioAuthorised(String, String) - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioListener
Called when a new access token & access token secret have been set.
onRdioReady() - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioListener
Called on the main thread when the Rdio API finishes initializing.
onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded(Intent) - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioListener
Called when your app doesn't provide an access token or access token secret.
onRdioUserPlayingElsewhere() - Method in interface com.rdio.android.api.RdioListener
Called on the main thread when the player determines that the current user is also playing from another location.

R

Rdio - Class in com.rdio.android.api
Main facade object for interacting with Rdio.
Rdio(String, String, String, String, Context, RdioListener) - Constructor for class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Constructor for the Rdio facade.
RdioApiCallback - Interface in com.rdio.android.api
A callback listener for Rdio.apiCall() requests to the web service API.
RdioListener - Interface in com.rdio.android.api
A callback listener for the Rdio SDK.
RdioSubscriptionType - Enum in com.rdio.android.api
Subscription type for the current Rdio user
RESULT_AUTHORISATION_ACCEPTED - Static variable in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Success result code passed to onActivityResult after you launch the intent from onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded().
RESULT_AUTHORISATION_REJECTED - Static variable in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio
Failure result code passed to onActivityResult after you launch the intent from onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded().

S

setTokenAndSecret(Intent) - Method in class com.rdio.android.api.Rdio

OAuth signs a request for the Rdio API using your application key and secret.

Begin the Rdio account signup process using a LinkShare affiliate URL.
